sense.gloss: taking on a life of its own (of a rumour, etc.)
walking by oneself, taking a walk by oneself
walking unaided, being able to walk without help
standing on one's own feet, being independent, taking care of oneself

sdata.j: こんな↑夜更↑↓よふ↓けに↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓の↑一人↑↓|ひとり↓↑歩↑↓ある↓き|は↑危↑↓あぶ↓ない。
sdata.e: It is not safe for a girl to go out by herself so late at night.

sdata.j: ↑発言↑↓はつげん↓の↑一部↑↓いちぶ↓だけがマスコミに↑取↑↓と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げられて↑独↑↓|ひと↓り↑歩↑↓ある↓き|した。
sdata.e: Just one part of what he said got picked up by the media and took on a life of its own.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑一人↑↓|ひとり↓↑歩↑↓ある↓き|が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑一人↑↓|ひとり↓↑歩↑↓ある↓き|が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
↑夜間↑↓やかん↓の|ひとり↑歩↑↓ある↓き|は↑危険↑↓きけん↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think it's dangerous to walk alone at night.

sdata.j: こんな↑夜更↑↓よふ↓けに↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓の↑一人↑↓|ひとり↓↑歩↑↓ある↓き|は↑危↑↓あぶ↓ない。
sdata.e: It isn't safe for a girl to go out by herself so late at night.

sdata.j: こんな↑夜更↑↓よふ↓けに↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓の↑一人↑↓|ひとり↓↑歩↑↓ある↓き|は↑危↑↓あぶ↓ない。
sdata.e: It's not safe for a girl to go out by herself this late at night.
